last_episode_to_air.overview: It is revealed that Ho Joon's real identity forced Jae Yoon to leave. Is there any way for the heartbroken Ho Joon to salvage the relationship?
last_episode_to_air.name: Come to Me

name: Roommates of Poongduck 304
overview: When Ho-jun receives an ultimatum to move out and become a successful team leader, he must rent from feisty Jae-yoon, who owns a villa. But when a twist of fate transfers Jae-yoon to Ho-jun's team, he becomes his unwilling employee.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When Ho-jun receives an ultimatum to move out and become a successful team leader, he must rent from feisty Jae-yoon, who owns a villa. But when a twist of fate transfers Jae-yoon to Ho-jun's team, he becomes his unwilling employee.

episodes.name: Accidental Meeting
episodes.overview: The first time Jae Yoon and Ho Joon cross paths, they end up leaving a bitter impression on one another. However, in a strange twist of fate, the next time they meet is at their company where it is revealed that they will be working with each other?

episodes.name: That Man's Reason
episodes.overview: Ho Joon is kicked out of his father's house because of his cynical personality and takes over the position of the team leader in the new department of the company, but interestingly enough, his landlord is soon set to become a member of his team!

episodes.name: War and Peace
episodes.overview: The hostility between Jae Yoon and Ho Joon is soon set to come to an end after the two challenge each other to a game with some rather high-stakes. The terms are set and it is clear that: whoever loses the battle must admit defeat and pack their belongings and leave immediately.

episodes.name: Resemblance of Ogon Bat and the Sea
episodes.overview: Following Ho Joon's accidental injury, the contested relationship between Jae Yoon and Ho Joon takes a turn for the better as the two find themselves gradually getting closer to each other day by day. One night, after a round of some heavy drinks, Jae Yoon accidentally reveals his affair with Seung Sik to Ho Joon.

episodes.name: Possibility
episodes.overview: When Jae Yoon accidentally discovers that Ho Joon was once a top graduate from New York University, he finds himself getting even more curious about his team leader at work.

episodes.name: Mistake or Intention
episodes.overview: Upon noticing that Jae Yoon has been secretly helping Seung Sik with all of his problems, Ho Joon decides to confront Jae Yoon and the two find themselves in the midst of a heated argument.

episodes.name: How to Love You
episodes.overview: After their fair share of ups and downs, Jae Yoon and Ho Joon finally express their feelings to each other. But upon discovering the truth behind Ho Joon, Jae Yoon can't help but feel anxious and concerned.

episodes.name: Come to Me
episodes.overview: It is revealed that Ho Joon's real identity forced Jae Yoon to leave. Is there any way for the heartbroken Ho Joon to salvage the relationship?
